data.what_is:
Contlo is a leading generative AI marketing platform to drive autonomous customer engagements via omnichannel campaigns, real-time generative customer journeys, AI-powered segmentation for one-to-one hyper-personalization, and actionable insights about your customer behavior.

Built for the AI-first world - Contlo enables modern businesses to leverage AI to orchestrate their end-to-end marketing. The platform helps brands increase customer lifetime value, boost customer engagements, and deliver a hyper-personalized experience to retain their most valuable customers.

Contlo is trusted by 1000s of fast-growing businesses to boost their sales by engaging loyal customers and making faster data-driven decisions throughout their customer lifecycle. Enabling them to measure and optimize individual customer experiences with the help of:

 Autonomous personalized campaigns for every customer touchpoint:
Effortlessly engage your customers with AI-powered autonomous campaigns across all major marketing channels like Email, SMS, WhatsApp, Web Push, Mobile Push, Facebook & Instagram.

 Real-time generative customer journeys powered by LLMs:
Goodbye templatized automation flows! Let AI build the most optimal customer engagement workflows & customer journeys based on their recent interactions to maximize your ROI.

 Generate Customer Segments for One-to-One Personalization using AI:
Orchestrate highly personalized and targeted customer interactions based on behavioral data, demographics & recent actions on the website.

 LLM generated insights, analytics & autonomous reporting:
Get granular visibility of your customer behavior, campaign performance, and overall business intelligence along with AI-generated insights, recommendations, and autonomous reporting.

 Autonomous customer engagement, LLM powered chatbots & a unified conversation inbox:
Deliver a seamless brand experience to your customers via chat across Facebook/Instagram/WhatsApp and make phone calls directly from a single dashboard.

Contlo seamlessly integrates with 200+ platforms to help brands build a powerful autonomous marketing tech stack around their business.

For more information, visit contlo.com or schedule a 1:1 personalized demo with us:

https://contlo.com/get-in-touch/?ref=g2

initial_reviews.review_title: Contlo is a game-changer in marketing automation tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Contlo?
Brands can seamlessly integrate email, WhatsApp, and SMS campaigns. With a user-friendly interface, customizable templates, and real-time analytics, it simplifies multi-channel marketing. Standout features include WhatsApp marketing, SMS campaigns, and customer support, making Contlo an all-in-one solution for efficient and impactful promo campaigns. Streamline your marketing efforts with Contlo for unparalleled customer engagement.

What do you dislike about Contlo?
While Contlo offers a comprehensive suite of marketing automation features, the WhatsApp Conversations app's user interface and features fall short when compared to other customer service platforms. One notable drawback is the relatively small chat box, limiting the visibility of conversations. Additionally, there appears to be a lack of customization options and advanced features, which can be restrictive for businesses seeking a more tailored and feature-rich customer service experience. Enhancing the UI and expanding customization capabilities would greatly improve the overall user experience within the WhatsApp Conversations app.

What problems is Contlo solving and how is that benefiting you?
One single 360' Automation platform for e-commerce brands, I don't need to use 3-4 different platforms for each channel like email marketing, WhatsApp & SMS. Creating campaign templates is way more easier than other platforms I have used for my store.

initial_reviews.review_title: A highly intuitive omnichannel marketing tool helps reach customers seamlessly across channels
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Contlo?
The platform is exceptionally intuitive, boasting a user-friendly interface that simplifies audience connection. The minimal learning curve and proactive support from the team further enhance its usability. Its intuitive interface streamlines audience interaction, and with minimal training required, it ensures a smooth and efficient user experience. Additionally, the proactive support from the team adds significant value to the platform.

What do you dislike about Contlo?
I have not encountered any negatives so far. all_reviews.review_title: Contlo is a game-changer in marketing automation tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Contlo?
Brands can seamlessly integrate email, WhatsApp, and SMS campaigns. With a user-friendly interface, customizable templates, and real-time analytics, it simplifies multi-channel marketing. Standout features include WhatsApp marketing, SMS campaigns, and customer support, making Contlo an all-in-one solution for efficient and impactful promo campaigns. Streamline your marketing efforts with Contlo for unparalleled customer engagement.

What do you dislike about Contlo?
While Contlo offers a comprehensive suite of marketing automation features, the WhatsApp Conversations app's user interface and features fall short when compared to other customer service platforms. One notable drawback is the relatively small chat box, limiting the visibility of conversations. Additionally, there appears to be a lack of customization options and advanced features, which can be restrictive for businesses seeking a more tailored and feature-rich customer service experience. Enhancing the UI and expanding customization capabilities would greatly improve the overall user experience within the WhatsApp Conversations app.

What problems is Contlo solving and how is that benefiting you?
One single 360' Automation platform for e-commerce brands, I don't need to use 3-4 different platforms for each channel like email marketing, WhatsApp & SMS. Creating campaign templates is way more easier than other platforms I have used for my store.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Contlo?
Contlo is a very good tool for retention, the audience section populates for every person who signs up in real-time. Segmentation also ensures proper campaign planning for niche audience and who are not active etc

What do you dislike about Contlo?
There's no way to pause a template in the flow builder. During Sales, we can't pause a particular template (with disc,) in the abandon checkout journey flow builder. There should be a way to pause a few templates on the flow builder that won't trigger unless we enable them, we can pause them during sales, and reactivate them after sales get over. Currently, if we disable it, the whole flow has to be disabled, if we want the second template to pause, we have to delete it and the whole data for it will be lost.

What problems is Contlo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Contlo makes retention easier, it is said that if the retention percentage increases by 5%, profitability increases by 55%. We grew from 0% to 28% currently in the past 10 months.

all_reviews.review_title: one place for all Retention Marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Contlo?
Contlo has been a fantastic partner for our brand, PALMONAS. Their support has been truly awesome - responsive, helpful, and always there when we needed assistance. The platform itself is a good tool that allows us to access WhatsApp, emails, and pop-ups, making it incredibly easy to manage our marketing efforts in one place. Moreover, their pricing is healthy, offering excellent value for the services provided. Overall, Contlo's all-integrative platform simplifies operations and helps us keep track efficiently. Highly recommended!

What do you dislike about Contlo?
The dashboard should be easier to use, and live chat help is a must.

you don't have to choose multiple platform for retention marketing. on contlo you ca plan everything at one place

We use Contlo completely for retention. The best part is you can re-engage your older audience and re-activate them by proper segmentation. This really helps in reving your audience.

You can also build pop forms/flyouts on your website to take option and increase your subscribers and gain new audience.

The customer service is superb, they are always available to help you and solve the queries at the earliest.

What do you dislike about Contlo?
I wish it had more predictable features like how a campaign has performed and what could be the next best plan of action like some of these advanced features, have helped solve a lot of analytical issues.

Contlo keeps all the retention channels in one place like SMS, WhatsApp and Emails, this ensures all data are in one place, we can see which channel performed better than the other, and optimise for the channel that worked better, also the flow builder UI is super smooth, any can build from scratch, and decide how their customer journeys and automation should be.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Contlo?
Contlo's UI is simple and easy to use. Segmenting your audience according to their behaviour is my favourite feature. This helps a lot in understanding what works and what doesn't. Also, the auto-populating features of these segments ensure less need to upload manually.

The customer service is top-notch, always available and faster settlement of issues.

What do you dislike about Contlo?
I hoped Contlo will have a gender field in the segment as well. That would have helped a lot in segregating the audience into men & women.

What problems is Contlo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Contlo has all three main channels of retention, be it email marketing or SMS or WhatsApp so everything is in one place so it makes is easier to check the performance of each and make study the data. The WhatsApp bot also helps answer most of the queries customers may have so our agents can take only important issues.

I loved the auto-population process for the customer segments, it makes things easier for me to send Whatsapp broadcasts without having to manually create lists and segments.

What do you dislike about Contlo?
The Whatsapp interface in a little work done as it gets a little glitchy sometimes, and the chats sometimes get sent twice. I mainly would like to see the WhatsApp interface get an upgrade.

What problems is Contlo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Contlo helps us divide and conquer, that is they help us create micro, small, and large data basis/segments based on our needs by using clauses to narrow down the segments required. Even email templates are much easier to use in comparison to other platforms/apps.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Contlo?
Contlo is an exceptional all-in-one campaign and automation tool, seamlessly integrated with Shopify. Its user-friendly platform allowed me to effortlessly manage email marketing, Push, Whatsapp and SMS Campaigns. The automation features streamlined tasks like abandoned cart recovery and customer follow-ups. The supportive team readily assisted me whenever I had questions. Contlo is a game-changer for Shopify stores!

What do you dislike about Contlo?
The "Notify me when available" feature could benefit from some slight tweaking to enhance its performance and user experience.

What problems is Contlo solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helps us Email, Push, Whatsapp and SMS marketing with proper analytics to track the revenue generation from each campaign. Also, automation like welcome emails, abandoned carts, etc helps us do follow-up seamlessly and effortlessly.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Contlo?
Well-equipped tool especially for automation flows and WhatsApp campaigns.
The template automation was also quite robust and ready to launch with only a few tweaks to meet our brand requirements.
Additionally, the support team including Arvind and Flossy was extremely helpful in the setup process and was with us each step of the way right from getting our number registered for the SMS and WhatsApp service providers, to help us with bluetick approval for WhatsApp which helped us to get the best possible results from the tool.

What do you dislike about Contlo?
A few more features for push notification design customization would help, we are currently unable to customise dimensions for delivery on different systems like mobile and desktop.

What problems is Contlo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Having my Whatsapp, sms, push notifications, and email campaigns set up in one place improves many metrics like recovering abandoned carts, and checkouts and nudging customers who have visited the website towards making the final purchase by being present for every step of the journey.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Contlo?
It is a great alternative to the expensive marketing automation tools which can definitely burn your bottom line and doesnt add much value due to custom integration. It helps in the cohort analysis of the customers acquired in the last 24 months, which further helps in understanding the efficiency of customer acquisition cost incurred each month and the quality of the cohort acquired each month. These values can be visualised in absolute numbers and percentages in a month-over-month or week-over-week format.

What do you dislike about Contlo?
It has yet to come up with powerful analytics reporting and custom reporting to match numbers. Rich notifications are yet to be developed as per the newer formats which are used by competing software available in the market. They are yet to come up with high quality customisation and richness in the notifications sent to the users.

What problems is Contlo solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is solving for marketing automation for campaigns and flows through multiple customer touch points with the help of integrating all the communications channels together.  It is helping us to streamline the marketing communication used to support digital marketing campaigns and customer retention marketing functions. It has brought together multiple channel-level marketing and analytics to optimise customer communication using smart segments based on customers' recency, monetary value and frequency of buying from the brand. This further helps in creating custom messaging and targeting options for these segmented users.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Contlo?
Contlo is one of the most user-friendly platforms to access all marketing tools across SMS, push and whatsapp. We could increase our revenue multifold. The team at Contlo is commendable and always willing to help. It is truly an omnichannel experience. Data from shopify seamlessly flows in and combined with campaign data making decision-making very easy.

What do you dislike about Contlo?
They are still building their integration with app platforms and it took us a little while before our integrations were live. However, the team is quick to respond to our queries.

What problems is Contlo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Earlier, we used to use multiple tools for multiple channels and audiences had to be uploaded from one place to another. With Contlo, all data is in one place. So time is saved, making it a more efficient process that yields the best results.

all_reviews.review_title: Overall good, WhatsApp need to be improved
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Contlo?
1. Ease of sending mail campaigns
2. Ease of sending WA campaigns (business initiated)
3. Good apps (Spinning Wheel, etc)
4. Proactive team and POC

What do you dislike about Contlo?
1. Commercials (little expensive considering WA limitations)
2. WhatsApp Conversations not user friendly
3. Insta and Facebook chats don't integrate (need to check them separately
4. WhatsApp feedback form (automation) feature available in Tellephant (previous service provider) is missing (customers get redirected to a different page)
5. Contlo created coupon codes not working
6. High Bounce rate for WhatsApp campaigns

What problems is Contlo solving and how is that benefiting you?
1. Helped in getting the account verified
2. Educating about some WhatsApp-related laws that helped maintain Good quality rating (green)
3. Customer signups improving (push, spin the wheel, etc)

The tool is super easy to use and understand, I like that it is self-explanatory, with good UX. Really like the support from the Contlo team, they are quick to respond to queries and are super helpful. Overall, an effective and affordable suite of tools for a business to use on a daily basis to communicate with their users.

What do you dislike about Contlo?
Nothing much to dislike. Analytics could be made better, I think Contlo team is still working on it.

What problems is Contlo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Omnichannel communication

all_reviews.review_title: An integrated omnichannel platform for SMS, Emails and Web Push Notification
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Contlo?
The tracking of SMS clicks and Automation workflows are good. One-stop solution for SMS, Email and Push Notification Automations. Better replacement to Omnisend.

What do you dislike about Contlo?
The templates could have been better. Despite the options given for customization, the templates aren't that pleasing aesthetically. There is no search bar for selecting products within the template.

What problems is Contlo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Remarketing our existing customer base is the primary use case for us. We also use Contlo for Abandoned cart recovery through automated Emails. We are now using SMS services for promotional communication.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent app for D2C brands. Great support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Contlo?
Integrates email, whatsapp, SMS and push in one single app which really helps to segment users and get best performance. Support from the team is also great

What do you dislike about Contlo?
Analytics is not integrated with ads. There is duplication in numbers because of this.

What problems is Contlo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Increasing M3/M6.
Reactivating dormant users
